open.tool_desc: Open a container or a door.

args.arg_desc: The object (e.g., container, door) to open.

close.tool_desc: Close a container or a door.

args.arg_desc: The object (e.g., container, door) to close.

pick_up.tool_desc: Add an object to your inventory.

args.arg_desc: The object to pick up.

put_down.tool_desc: Remove an object from your inventory and place it in the current location.

args.arg_desc: The object from inventory to put down.

move.tool_desc: Transfer an object to a new location or container.

args.arg_desc: The object to be moved.
The target container or location to move the object to.

pour.tool_desc: Pour a substance from one container to another.

args.arg_desc: The container holding the substance to be poured.
The container into which the substance will be poured.

dunk.tool_desc: Immerse an object or container in a liquid (usually in another container).

args.arg_desc: The object or container to be dunked.
The container holding the liquid to dunk into.

mix.tool_desc: Chemically combine contents of a specified container or substance.

args.arg_desc: The container or substance whose contents are to be mixed.

look_around.tool_desc: Survey your current surroundings, listing objects and exits.

look_at.tool_desc: Examine an object closely to get more details about it.

args.arg_desc: The object to examine.

look_in.tool_desc: Peek inside a container to see its contents.

args.arg_desc: The container object to look inside.

read.tool_desc: Review written content on an object (e.g., a book, a sign).

args.arg_desc: The object that has readable content.

activate.tool_desc: Toggle a device on (e.g., a stove, a sink).

args.arg_desc: The device to activate.

deactivate.tool_desc: Toggle a device off (e.g., a stove, a sink).

args.arg_desc: The device to deactivate.

use.tool_desc: Utilize a device or item, optionally on another target object.

args.arg_desc: The tool or item to use.
Optional. The target object to use the tool/item on.
The item to examine.

go_to.tool_desc: Relocate to a new location within the environment.

args.arg_desc: The name of the location to move to.
The edible object to eat.

flush.tool_desc: Activate a flushing mechanism (e.g., a toilet).

args.arg_desc: The object with a flushing mechanism.

focus_on.tool_desc: Direct attention to a particular object. This is usually for completing a task goal and indicates task completion if the object is correct.

args.arg_desc: The object to focus on to complete a task objective.

task.tool_desc: Recap your current objective or task description.

inventory.tool_desc: Display items currently carried in your inventory.
